name: Friendsheep
description: Friendsheep is a isometric 3D with a very flat design, is a local coop game. In Friendsheep you need to bring your beloved blind sheep to the barn, your sheeps was blind because of their wool hide their eyes. This game talk about love between humans and animals. We are a team of five creator (game designer, artist and devs) come from Réunion island in the middle of indian ocean, we have a bad internet connexion but very good connexion with video game creation !
